FuncDef: The display igmp snooping invalid-packet verbose command displays information about invalid IGMP Snooping packets. The display igmp snooping invalid-packet verbose command displays information about invalid IGMP Snooping packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the specified number of invalid IGMP Snooping packets latest received.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 100. By default, information about all the stored invalid IGMP Snooping packets is displayed.
